reviews.text: Swimming pool, spa, water garden & pond expert with installation & repairs, plus pumps & fountains. 204 N Galloway Ave, Mesquite, TX 75149 Updated by this business 1 week ago

Day Light Savings Time..... All day yesterday ran smooth! But how many of yall got in your car this morning and looked at your dash and thought you were an hour late for work?!?! Oh! Just me? I always forget to adjust THAT clock!

Please accept my apologies that what you needed was not quickly solved by other staff in the store.  Travis is a specialist and IS worth waiting for if you have the time when he is already s

Great repair shop! We were having issues with our pool pump and our regular repair shop quoted us over $4000 for the repair. Gave these guys a call l, took them my pump, and $800 later, we were running again. Definitely switching to them for my future needs. Also have a great showroom if you're looking to liven up your back yard. Response from the owner 9 months ago Thank you for sharing a review of your experience with Dickson Brothers, and glad    you discovered us and are up and running again

I needed my roughly 10 year old pond to be helped as it had developed leaks.  So why not update it in the process!!:-)  Travis and Luke came out, took measurements, heard my wants, discussed my options and forwarded us an estimate within a … More Response from the owner a year ago We love your pond!  Thank you for letting us help you with it, and for your review.  Happy Pond Keeping!!!
